An inspirational evening

in every sense.

 

Anticipation is building –

we’ve selected the wines, chosen the gourmet canapès, all while unearthing the truth behind the brands.
 

Spaces are filling up, so to secure your place

please RSVP to pholmes@tribeuk.co.uk

 
 
Répondez s’il vous plaît
 

We look forward to welcoming you to the heart of Nottingham’s creative quarter for a unique evening sharing stories and challenges with like minded people.
